sentences.en: He had survived by eating a small tin of fruit every day.
sentences.cn: 他靠每天吃一小罐水果活了下来。

sentences.en: He reached for a tin of tobacco on the shelf behind him.
sentences.cn: 他伸手去够身后架子上的一罐烟叶。

sentences.en: In the guard's van lay my tin trunk.
sentences.cn: 我的铁皮箱放在了卫兵的行李车厢中。

sentences.en: Pour the mixture into the cake tin and bake for 45 minutes.
sentences.cn: 把混合物倒进烤模烤制45分钟。

sentences.en: Send round to the grocer's for a tin of biscuits.
sentences.cn: 叫人到食品店去买一听饼干.

sentences.en: She accidentally knocked the tea tin off the shelf.
sentences.cn: 她不小心把架子上的茶叶罐碰了下来。

sentences.en: She undressed the child before putting her in the tin bath.
sentences.cn: 她给孩子脱下衣服，然后把她放进锡铁澡盆里。

sentences.en: She yanked the lid off the tin.
sentences.cn: 她猛一下拉掉了金属盒的盖子.

sentences.en: Spread the mixture in the cake tin and bake for 30 minutes.
sentences.cn: 将混合物抹在蛋糕烤盘里，烘烤30分钟。

sentences.en: The boy beat out a tune on a tin can.
sentences.cn: 那男孩在易拉罐上敲出一首曲子.

sentences.en: the steady drumming of the rain on the tin roof
sentences.cn: 雨点打在铁皮屋顶上发出的有节奏的嗒嗒声

sentences.en: The tea was sweetened with a hoarded tin of condensed milk.
sentences.cn: 用贮藏的一罐炼乳为茶添加了甜味。

words.tran_cn: 罐头的；镀锡的，包马口铁的；听装的
锡的；含锡的；像锡的；有锡味的
包以马口铁（tin的过去分词）

phrases.tran_cn: 不能（或不善于）辨别音高的，不解音律的
[美国英语]使用警徽的(指凭此可得到免费用餐等特殊照顾)
同 put the lid on （见 lid）
锡人（全铝太空服的绰号）
焊锡；锡焊条，锡焊料；软焊料

trans.tran_cn: 锡，罐头盒，马口铁，镀锡薄钢板
trans.tran_en: a small metal container in which food or drink is sold
